🧹 Cleanup Summary:
- Delete all God Model files (train, backtest, 6 models)
- Delete all old models (surge_predictor, standalone models)
- Delete all stock data (penny_stocks_data.csv, backtest results)
- Delete 40+ analysis/test scripts
- Clear web signal data (signals_today.csv, signals_history.csv)

🔧 Maintenance Mode:
- Add maintenance.html template
- Enable MAINTENANCE_MODE in web/app.py
- Website now shows upgrade notice

📁 Clean Structure:
- Keep: web/ (Flask app, user DB, payments)
- Keep: src/, config.yaml, main.py
- Empty: data/, models/, results/

📋 Next Steps:
- Wait for Kiwoom Open API approval
- Integrate Kiwoom real-time data
- Build new ML model with Kiwoom data
- Relaunch website with new system

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

)")
